import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{fetchMenuItems}from'../services/menuService';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Menu(_ref){let{addToCart}=_ref;const[activeCategory,setActiveCategory]=useState('lunch');const[menuItems,setMenuItems]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetchMenuItems(activeCategory).then(setMenuItems);},[activeCategory]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setActiveCategory('lunch'),children:"B\u1EEFa Tr\u01B0a"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setActiveCategory('diner'),children:"B\u1EEFa T\u1ED1i"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setActiveCategory('appetizer'),children:"Khai V\u1ECB"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setActiveCategory('drinks'),children:"\u0110\u1ED3 U\u1ED1ng"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:menuItems.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[item.price.toLocaleString()," VND"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>addToCart(item.name,item.price,item.image),children:"\uD83D\uDED2"})]},index))})]});}export default Menu;
